recipe.title: Lemon Cake
recipe.ingredients: 1 pkg. yellow cake mix 1/2 cup vegetable oil 1 pkg instant lemon pudding 3 eggs 1 cup orange juice Icing: 1 1/2 cups confectioners sugar 2 Tbs. butter 1/3 cup lemon juice General Info: Preheat oven to 350 degrees
recipe.steps: In a mixing bowl combine cake mix, oil and lemon pudding and orange juice Add in eggs one at a time mixing well. Pour batter into a greased square baking pan. Bake for 40 - 45 minutes; remove from oven and cool Combine icing ingredients, poke a few holes in the cake and pour over top once cooled, or use lemon glaze
